row.entry: A list of parameters (key/value pairs) that should be passed to the XSLT processor. When using e.g. the wbreport2liquibase.xslt stylesheet, the value of the author attribute can be set using -xsltParameter="authorName=42". This parameter can be provided multiple times for multiple parameters, e.g. when using wbreport2pg.xslt: -xsltParameter="makeLowerCase=42" -xsltParameter="useJdbcTypes=true"
